body_html:
Thanks @JerrikEph After changing code to this:

    initial_state = tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMStateTuple(tf.contrib.seq2seq.tile_batch(encoder_state[0], multiplier=10),
                                                  tf.contrib.seq2seq.tile_batch(encoder_state[1], multiplier=10)),

and make sure

impute_finished = False

It is compiled correctly
However, windows users may encounter issue 9832
If you are not using windows, it should be fine.

body:
Thanks @JerrikEph After changing code to this:
``` python
    initial_state = tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMStateTuple(tf.contrib.seq2seq.tile_batch(encoder_state[0], multiplier=10),
                                                  tf.contrib.seq2seq.tile_batch(encoder_state[1], multiplier=10)),
```
and make sure
```
impute_finished = False
```
It is compiled correctly
However, windows users may encounter issue [9832](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/9832)
If you are not using windows, it should be fine.
